title: The More PC League Becomes
body: The More Toxic The Community Becomes

replies.body: Who? Why would you care if I was?

Wait what? I have noticed a significantly better chat since I started playing the game. However, I have noticed a lot more stealth trolling, not only in game play, but in chat too. I've seen people try to tilt others intentionally just to try and get them punished by baiting others. It's kind of gross and awful and kind of revolting to see that some person gets their jollies off by baiting someone's anger.

Basically this, I'm tired of seeing people dodging the instant feedback system while they push their team towards the edge.
It's SO easy to do things that don't get you banned but make your entire team lose/flame you. Which is completely frustrating.
I've started sympathizing with some flamers because of that, because I KNOW exactly what's going on many times. I've dropped an entire division because of people doing stealth trolling. It's incredibly frustrating, and I have the patience and self control to not flame (honor level 4) but I completely understand my teammates' positions when they lash out at those sneaky tards.

It's incredibly frustrating, and I have the patience and self control to not flame (honor level 4) but I completely understand my teammates' positions when they lash out at those sneaky tards.

I try to cut it off in chat when I see it and tell the person being flamed that they're just getting baited into punishment and they should mute and move on. This usually turns the focus on to me from those baiters and I just mute them and keep on playing too. Sometimes it works, but usually, the person being baited and falling for it is the type that stays angry and continues the flame war anyway.

It sucks but I think baiting needs to be punished too but that's going to take time to convince Riot and also teach the IFS.
